DOC.brief_summary: To describe trends in treatment patterns of Small Dialysis Organizations (SDOs) prior to and during the implementation of the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services' (CMS') policy [End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD) Prospective Payment System (PPS)] to bundle reimbursement for all dialysis services. Specifically, to describe CMS ESRD PPS quality performance measures for dialysis centers over time.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Prospective Payment System
